name: __EFractureModeNewAssetLocation
doc: Control the default asset folder presented when using the "New" tool to create a Geometry Collection in Fracture Mode

SourceAssetFolder: Default to creating rest collections in the same folder as the source asset.
LastUsedFolder: Default to creating rest collections in the last folder selected this session. If no folder was selected yet, use the Source Asset Folder.
ContentBrowserFolder: Default to creating reset collections in the currently-visible Asset Browser folder if available, otherwise use the Last Used Folder.
